title: Consequences of Deception
description: Consequences of Deception is a USA Today Best SellerOnce upon a time, girl met boy and a love story began.Their future was assured until tragedy struck.Sloane Evans lost nearly everyone that she's ever loved, but losing Killian Brandt left a scar that never healed.Four and a half years after turning his back on her, Killian steps back into Sloane's life in the most shocking of ways, giving her no choice but to abandon her life and go with him.Why would a man buy a woman that he hates?Not everything is as it appears.Love is beautiful, revenge is ugly, and lies destroy lives.Prepare to discover the Consequences of Deception.**Author If nice guys are your jam, Killian Brandt is not for you.**
author: Ella Fox
